Package net.objectzoo.events.impl

Class Event2Caller<T1,​T2>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.objectzoo.events.impl.Event2Caller<T1,​T2>
  • Type Parameters:
    T1 - The type of the first information parameter the event provides
    T2 - The type of the second information parameter the event provides
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.BiConsumer<T1,​T2>, Action2<T1,​T2>, Event2<T1,​T2>, Event2Delegate<T1,​T2>
    public class Event2Caller<T1,​T2>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Event2Delegate<T1,​T2>
    The Event2Caller is a Event2Delegate implementation that allows event distribution to a single subscriber. It is a helper class that encapsulates all the logic required to provide events in other classes. Subscription of excessive subscribers results in IllegalStateExceptions to be thrown.
    Author:
    tilmann
